sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shíjì shàng, zhè jiàn shì hěn jiǎndān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En fait, cette affaire est très simple.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Actually, this matter is very simple.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 学生们在实验室做实验。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéshengmen zài shíyànshì zuò shíyàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étudiants font des expériences dans le laboratoire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The students are doing experiments in the laboratory.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们生活在二十一世纪。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen shēnghuó zài èrshíyī shìjì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous vivons au vingt-et-unième siècle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We live in the twenty-first century.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他始终相信自己能成功。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shǐzhōng xiāngxìn zìjǐ néng chénggōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a toujours cru qu'il pouvait réussir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has always believed that he can succeed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shìshí zhèngmíng tā shì duì de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les faits prouvent qu'il avait raison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The facts prove that he was right.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 世界杯每四年举办一次。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shìjièbēi měi sì nián jǔbàn yī cì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Coupe du Monde a lieu tous les quatre ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The World Cup is held every four years.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè fèn gōngzuò hěn shìhé nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce travail te convient très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This job suits you very well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège bówùguǎn shōufèi ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce musée est-il payant ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Does this museum charge an entrance fee?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiān bànlǐ rùzhù shǒuxù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez d'abord effectuer les formalités d'enregistrement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please complete the check-in procedures first.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn kuài shìyìng le xīn huánjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'est rapidement adapté au nouvel environnement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He quickly adapted to the new environment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hěn duō rén shōukàn zhège jiémù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Beaucoup de gens regardent ce programme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Many people watch this program.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiǎng huányóu shìjiè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il veut faire le tour du monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He wants to travel around the world.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Běijīng shì Zhōngguó de shǒudū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pékin est la capitale de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beijing is the capital of China.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 首先，我想介绍一下自己。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shǒuxiān, wǒ xiǎng jièshào yīxià zìjǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: D'abord, je voudrais me présenter.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: First, I would like to introduce myself.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 图书馆每天早上八点开门。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Túshūguǎn měitiān zǎoshang bā diǎn kāimén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La bibliothèque ouvre à huit heures du matin tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The library opens at eight o'clock every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shǒuzhǐ hěn cháng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses doigts sont très longs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her fingers are very long.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài zhèlǐ méiyǒu shúrén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne connais personne ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't have any acquaintances here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè kē shù sǐ le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet arbre est mort.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This tree is dead.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā sònggěi tā yī shù huā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il lui a offert un bouquet de fleurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He gave her a bouquet of flowers.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū shǔyú wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre m'appartient.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book belongs to me.
